text: Buna ndimona, tala phunda yidi fufulu banga nlangu tsaka. Dizina di mutu wowo wuvuanda vana mbata phunda beni diba “lufua” ayi tsi yi bafua yiba kunlandakana. Baba vana lulendo, mu ndambu yimosi mu zindambu ziya zi ntoto, lu vondila mu sabala, mu kanda ki nzala, mu lufua, mu bibulu binsitu bidi va ntoto.
